members.name: Eric van der Burg
members.biography:
Eric van der BurgSummaryEric van der Burg (1965) was born in Amsterdam and lives in Amsterdam. He is in total 734 days active in the House of Representatives.More infoEducation and careerExtra activities, travel and giftsSocial media linksEmailX

SummaryEric van der Burg (1965) was born in Amsterdam and lives in Amsterdam. He is in total 734 days active in the House of Representatives.More infoEducation and careerExtra activities, travel and giftsSocial media linksEmailX

Eric van der Burg (1965) was born in Amsterdam and lives in Amsterdam. He is in total 734 days active in the House of Representatives.

More infoEducation and careerExtra activities, travel and gifts

Biography“Looking for structural solutions”There are some problems that require structural, political solutions, like the housing shortage. We have to work together to make sure that everyone has a home and enough income to get by. Another common challenge is managing the influx of asylum seekers. Those are the goals I spend my days working towards, aiming for a result that we can all get behind.Not words but deedsI’ve been in politics for more than 40 years and in that time I learned that I am a doer. On top of that, I love debating and engaging with people. We’re all in it together: that’s why I spend a lot of my time with the people, out in the field. I get to meet countless people on the job, but I do always try to strike a balance between listening, talking and doing. While I was born in Amsterdam, the Rotterdam mindset of 'not words but deeds' is close to my heart.Hazes is kingI love hiking in nature and I’m an avid runner. When I go outside for some exercise, I finally get to relax. I also love music, and Hazes will always be king for me. My favourite song? “Voor mij geen slingers aan de wand”, no doubt about it.CommitteesArt committeeBenelux Interparliamentary AssemblyContact group United StatesDefenceEducation, Culture and ScienceEuropean AffairsForeign AffairsForeign Trade and DevelopmentInteriorJustice and SecurityKingdom RelationsNATO Parliamentary AssemblyOSCE Parliamentary AssemblySocial Affairs and Employment

Biography“Looking for structural solutions”There are some problems that require structural, political solutions, like the housing shortage. We have to work together to make sure that everyone has a home and enough income to get by. Another common challenge is managing the influx of asylum seekers. Those are the goals I spend my days working towards, aiming for a result that we can all get behind.Not words but deedsI’ve been in politics for more than 40 years and in that time I learned that I am a doer. On top of that, I love debating and engaging with people. We’re all in it together: that’s why I spend a lot of my time with the people, out in the field. I get to meet countless people on the job, but I do always try to strike a balance between listening, talking and doing. While I was born in Amsterdam, the Rotterdam mindset of 'not words but deeds' is close to my heart.Hazes is kingI love hiking in nature and I’m an avid runner. When I go outside for some exercise, I finally get to relax. I also love music, and Hazes will always be king for me. My favourite song? “Voor mij geen slingers aan de wand”, no doubt about it.

There are some problems that require structural, political solutions, like the housing shortage. We have to work together to make sure that everyone has a home and enough income to get by. Another common challenge is managing the influx of asylum seekers. Those are the goals I spend my days working towards, aiming for a result that we can all get behind.

I’ve been in politics for more than 40 years and in that time I learned that I am a doer. On top of that, I love debating and engaging with people. We’re all in it together: that’s why I spend a lot of my time with the people, out in the field. I get to meet countless people on the job, but I do always try to strike a balance between listening, talking and doing. While I was born in Amsterdam, the Rotterdam mindset of 'not words but deeds' is close to my heart.

I love hiking in nature and I’m an avid runner. When I go outside for some exercise, I finally get to relax. I also love music, and Hazes will always be king for me. My favourite song? “Voor mij geen slingers aan de wand”, no doubt about it.

CommitteesArt committeeBenelux Interparliamentary AssemblyContact group United StatesDefenceEducation, Culture and ScienceEuropean AffairsForeign AffairsForeign Trade and DevelopmentInteriorJustice and SecurityKingdom RelationsNATO Parliamentary AssemblyOSCE Parliamentary AssemblySocial Affairs and Employment
